Aʻoaʻo
Huikani
Hoʻomaka
Nā koho
Ke puka nei
Huanahu
Noi
Koho pae
Q1 He aha 5 + 3?
a) 8
b) 7
c) 6
d) 9
ʻO ka wehewehe: Hoʻohui e pili i ka hoʻohuiʻana iʻelua a iʻole nā ​​helu hou e loaʻa ai ka huina. E hoʻoponopono i 5 + 3, heluʻoe i ka 5, a laila e helu i 3 hou, e like me keʻano he 8.
Q2 Inā loaʻa iāʻoe he 4 mau hua a loaʻa iāʻoe 2 hou aʻe, ehia kāu mau huaora?
a) 4
b) 5
c) 6
d) 7
ʻO ka weheweheʻana: eʻike i ka nui o nā huapalapala āu e hoʻohui ai No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 6.
Q3ʻO wai ka mea e like me 2 + 6?
A) 5 + 2
B) 6 + 3
c) 7 + 4
d) 4 + 4 
ʻO ka wehewehe: 4 + 4 ka like me 2 + 6. helu helu 4 mai 4 mau mea hou mai US 8. No laila,ʻo ia ka pane kūpono.
Q4 Inā loaʻa iāʻoe he 7 mau'āpana aʻaiʻoe iā 2 o lākou, ehia nā mau mile āu i waiho ai?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
ʻO ka weheweheʻana: ināʻaiʻoe i kahi mea, ua liʻiliʻiʻoe i kēlā mea. No laila, eʻike i ka nui o nā mea āu i haʻalele ai, e hōʻemiʻoe i ka nui o nā moni iʻaiʻia (2) mai ka nui o nā campies (7). 7 - 2 mau kaulike 5. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 5.
Q5 He aha ka helu i hala ma ka hoʻohālikelike: 9 + __ = 11?
a) 1
b) 2
c) 3
d) 4
ʻO ka weheweheʻana: e loaʻa i ka helu nalo,ʻikeʻoe i ka nui o 11, mai ka helu helu 2.
Q6 He aha ka 9 - 3?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
ʻO ka wehewehe: e pili ana i ka hoʻoiliʻana i kahi helu i kekahi. E hoʻoponopono i ka 9 - 3, hoʻomakaʻoe me 9 a lawe aku i ka 3, e waiho ana iāʻoe me 6.
Q7 Inā loaʻa iāʻoe he 7 mau mile a hāʻawiʻoe i 2, pehea ka nui o nā māka āu i waiho ai?
a) 3
b) 4
c) 5
d) 6
ʻO ka weheweheʻana: ke hāʻawi aku neiʻoe i kahi mea, ua liʻiliʻiʻoe i kēlā mea. No laila, eʻike i ka nui o nā marles āu i haʻalele ai, e hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka helu i hāʻawiʻia (2) mai ka nui o nā marbles (7). 7 - 2 mau kaulike 5. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 5.
Q8ʻO wai kekahi o kēia mau mea like me 8 - 4?
a) 7 - 3
b) 6 - 2
c) 5 - 3
D) 8 - 2
ʻO ka wehewehe: 7 - 3ʻo ia ka mea like me 8
Q9 Ina he 10 mau manu 10 ma luna o kahi kumulāʻau a me 3 lele lele, ehia nā manu, ehia nā manu i koe i ka lāʻau?
a) 5
b) 6
c) 7
d) 8
Wehewehe: Ke lele nei nā manu e lele ana, nā helu nui o nā manu. Eʻike i ka nui o nā manu he nui, e hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka helu e lele ana (3) mai ka nui o nā manu (10). 10 - 3 mau kaulike 7. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 7.
Q10 He aha ka helu o ka nalo i ka hoʻohālikelike: 6 - __ = 4?
a) 1
b) 2
c) 3
d) 4
ʻO ka wehewehe: e loaʻa i ka helu nalo, e hōʻemi i ka hopena iʻikeʻia mai ka helu hoʻomaka. No laila, 6 - 4 mau kaulike 2.ʻO ka helu nalo 2. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 2.
Q11 He aha 4 x 3?
A) 6
b) 7
c) 10
d) 12
ʻO ka wehewehe: E pili ana i ka hoʻonui i ka hoʻohui hou. E hoʻoponopono iā 4 X 3, hoʻohuiʻoe i 4ʻekolu mau manawa, 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 = no laila, he 12.
Q12 Inā he 5 mau penikala ma kēlā me kēia pahu a he 4 mau pahu, ehia nā penikala he nui?
A) 20
b) 15
c) 36
d) 25
ʻO ka wehewehe: Eʻike i ka nui o nā penikala he nui, e hoʻonui ana i ka nui o nā penikala ma kēlā me kēia pā (4) ma ka helu o nā pākeke (4). 5 x 4 e like me 20. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 20.
Q13ʻO wai ka mea e like me ka like me 3 x 6?
a) 9 x 2
b) 12 x 3
c) 4 x 4
d) 7 x 2
ʻO ka wehewehe: 3 MITLIPIED e 6 E hāʻawi iā mākou iā 18, 9 i hoʻonuiʻia e 2. No laila,ʻo ia ka pane pololei.
Q14 Inā he 8 mau haumāna i kēlā me kēia lālani a he 3 mau lālani, ehia nā haumāna he nui nā haumāna?
a) 16
b) 20
C) 24
d) 32
ʻO ka wehewehe: eʻike i ka nui o nā haumāna, e hoʻonui ana i nā haumāna i kēlā me kēia o nā haumāna i kēlā me kēia o nā lālani (8) e ka nui o nā lālani (3). 8 x 3 e like me 24. No laila,ʻo ka pane pololei he 24.
Q15 He aha ka helu nalo i ka hoʻohālikelike: 7 x __ = 21?
a) 4
b) 3
c) 2
d) 1
ʻO ka wehewehe: e loaʻa i ka helu nalo, hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka hopena iʻikeʻia e ka helu hoʻomaka. No laila, 21 maheleʻia e 7 mau kaulike 3. No laila,ʻo ka helu nalowale he 3. Pēlā,ʻo ia ka pane kūpono.
Q16 He aha ka 12 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 3?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 6
Wehewehe E hoʻopau i 12 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 3, ponoʻoe eʻike i ka nui o nā pūʻulu o 3 mau pūʻulu o 12 mau pūʻulu o 4 mau pūʻulu.
Q17 Inā he 15 mau mika a ua like lākou a ua like lākou ma waena o 5 mau hoaaloha, ehia mau kālā e loaʻa ai kēlā me kēia hoaaloha?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 5
ʻO ka wehewehe:ʻO ka māhele e pili ana i ka neʻeʻana i ka hana likeʻole. Eʻike i ka nui o nā cill i loaʻa i kēlā me kēia hoaaloha, hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka nui o nā cupties (15) e ka nui o nā hoaaloha (5). 15 Maheleʻia e 5 mau kaulike 3. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 3.
Q18ʻO wai ka mea e like me ka like o 20 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 4?
a) 100 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 25
b) 50 Ua hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 10
c) 6 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 3
d) 7 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 1
ʻO ka wehewehe:ʻO ka māheleʻokoʻa ke kūlike o ka hoʻonuiʻana. No laila, eʻike i nā mea i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e 20 mau like, hiki iāʻoe ke noʻonoʻo e pili ana i nā hui o 4. no laila,ʻo 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50, 50.
Q19 Inā he 24 mau huaʻai a waihoʻia lākou i loko o 6 mau hīnaʻi, pehea nā huapalapala i laila ma kēlā me kēia hīnaʻi?
a) 2
b) 4
c) 6
d) 8
ʻO ka wehewehe:ʻO ka māhele e pili ana i ka neʻeʻana i ka hana likeʻole. Eʻike i ka nui o nā hua he nui i kēlā me kēia hīnaʻi, hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka nui o nā huapalapala o nā huapalapala (24) e ka nui o nā waihona (6). 24 maheleʻia e 6 mau kaulike 4. No laila,ʻo ka pane kūpono he 4.
Q20 He aha ka helu i hala i ka hoʻohālikelike: 15 i hoʻokaʻawaleʻia e __ = 3?
a) 2
b) 3
c) 4
d) 5
ʻO ka weheweheʻana: e loaʻa i ka helu nalo, hoʻokaʻawaleʻoe i ka hopena iʻikeʻia e ka pane. No laila, 15 Maheleʻia e 3 mau kaulike 5. No laila,ʻo ka helu nalo)ʻo 5. No laila,ʻo ia ka pane kūpono.
Ua hoʻopauʻoe i kēlā me kēia pae
Ua leleʻoe i nā pae (s)
Hoʻomaopopo i nā arithmetics:ʻike maikaʻi
Helu'ōlelo
Nā pane pololei:
Nā pane pololei:
ʻO kāu pololei
ʻO kāu hopena
